pageContent: Objectives: Qualitative studies nested within clinical trials can provide insight into the treatment experience, how this evolves over time and where improved supportive care is required. The purpose of this qualitative study is to describe the lived experiences of men with advanced prostate cancer participating in the TheraP trial; a randomised trial of 177Lu-PSMA-617 compared with cabazitaxel chemotherapy.

metaData.source:
Codesigning a patient support portal with health professionals and men with prostate cancer: An action research study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35411697/
